title: Fix emoji alignment in profile creation mobile view

requirements.summary: Fix emoji alignment in profile creation page so emojis are properly centered within their selection boxes on mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Emojis in the profile setup emoji selection grid are visually centered both horizontally and vertically within their boxes on mobile devices
The emoji grid maintains consistent spacing and alignment across all emoji options
No visual bugs or misalignment issues appear in the profile creation view on mobile screen sizes

file_operations.description: Update the emoji selection grid styling to ensure proper centering of emoji characters within their boxes on mobile view. Add CSS classes or inline styles that use flexbox centering (items-center, justify-center) and ensure consistent box sizing and text alignment for the emoji buttons. Verify that the grid layout maintains proper spacing and that each emoji appears centered both horizontally and vertically within its clickable area across all mobile screen sizes.
